People don't like NTR for many reasons : (1) The plot is so stupid it starts to erode and wither the brain. (2) The reader can sympathize with the MC, feeling his pain and sadness fester. (3) The MC becomes a stupid cuck monkey. Or (4) She's literally fucking right on top of you! It should be logically god damn impossible to sleep through that unless your fucking comatose.

@RetardedMidget you have told it. But that is because the "Netorare" tag is bad used. To be a real netorare, the story have to be told from the "losing-lover"'s perspective. Here, the MC is the wife, from her PoV she doesn't lose nothing, she gain a lover. So, at least this chap, is just cheating.
